Savvy's AI-generated runbooks help developers resolve user-facing issues faster.
Savvyâ€™s CLI and browser extension provide developers with the knowledge they need
to resolve user facing incidents faster, with fewer escalations.
Savvy's CLI allows developers to record their shell and create runbooks right
right from their terminal.
Savvy's ClI also allows developers to create runbooks from their shell history
and share them with their team.
